pages.text: The crucible is a device capable of melting the materials required to forge steel. Place the crucible above a heat source. Right click with an ingot of $(l:alloying/steel#pig_iron)Pig Iron$() to create molten pig iron and then right click with 3 ingots of $(l:alloying/steel#wrought_iron)Wrought Iron$() to make 3 steel ingots.
